method: Roll out the pizza dough on a floured surface to your desired thickness.
Place the rolled-out dough onto a greased baking sheet.
Spread the pizza sauce evenly over the dough, leaving a border around the edges.
Sprinkle the mozzarella cheese over the sauce.
Top with cooked pork sausage and sliced bell peppers.
Sprinkle the dried oregano, garlic powder, onion powder, salt, and pepper over the toppings.
Bake in the preheated oven for 15-20 minutes, or until the crust is golden brown and the cheese is melted and bubbly.
Remove from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes before slicing and serving the pork-a-doodle delight!
